Articles.Content: I would like to see them with selecteable textures, like on stretchy SRB and such.....

That, and / or a doorless version.

I have no real desire to see my partlist clogged with multiple parts with just varying textures though, so simply having the option to replace the texture with a smooth one (with perhaps a less-obvious door) would be phenomenal. Right now stacking multiple compartments kinda of looks a little odd, since most parts in KSP are *not* ribbed (in fact the small fuel tank is the only part that I can think of that is), and having the big giant stack of obvious panels starts to look a little weird. Making the doors much less obvious (thinner outline, more subdued color) and a smooth look would be the tits.

I'd try my hand at retexturing it myself but I have no idea how to handle these filetypes.

Edited December 22, 2013 by Frostiken

Are the doors meant to close as soon as you open them with a Kerbal?

They just don't want to stay open for some reason...

As soon as the opening animation is done, the doors begin to close... Kinda frustrating...
Great idea for a mod. Only problem is that my doors won't open at all. They work in the VAB, not during flight.

Great idea for a mod. Only problem is that my doors won't open at all. They work in the VAB, not during flight.

You need a Kerbal to open them from EVA...

You need a Kerbal to open them from EVA...

Behold, the result of not reading instructions!

Thanks, I will try that.
Don't just store objects, you can put anything in one!

You should definitely pay attention where the doors are facing when building the ship, as Nick documents the mishap:

..Or just don't open them xD
I can't seem to get my doors to open at all. not in the VAB, not from the flight scene, not from EVA.

You should definitely pay attention where the doors are facing when building the ship, as Nick documents the mishap:

..Or just don't open them xD

I didn't have that large of a mishap, but I did have the door take off one of my solar panels.

the doors don't work right in flight.

the door animation jumps to open position and plays the close animation.

so its not possible to open the door in flight.

i just tested it with the 1m version.

still a usefull and nice looking part

Yea I've been having the same problem too, I'm pretty sure I installed it right. Anybody have suggestions?

Yea I've been having the same problem too, I'm pretty sure I installed it right. Anybody have suggestions?

Same deal here, haven't had any success.
Once again, problems with the doors not opening are because you most likely lack FIRESPITTER!!!!!!! It isn't optional guys.....

Once again, problems with the doors not opening are because you most likely lack FIRESPITTER!!!!!!! It isn't optional guys.....

You are incorrect. First thing I did was update Firespitter.

The doors function, to a point - they just play the close animation instead of the open one. Please don't assume that people are stupid when they have a problem. Most of us find it offensive.

My comment was mostly aimed at AlanRayne, his problem sounds like he most defiantly skipped installing firespitter. I've seen the bug your mentioning before with other mods, it usually happens when a part forgets what stage of the animation the part should be at.....

Usually shows up as a part opening or closing when it should be doing the opposite...

My comment was mostly aimed at AlanRayne, his problem sounds like he most defiantly skipped installing firespitter. I've seen the bug your mentioning before with other mods, it usually happens when a part forgets what stage of the animation the part should be at.....

Usually shows up as a part opening or closing when it should be doing the opposite...

The most recent firespitter is included in the download...
Which, to be fair, doesn't mean that people put it in their folder.

I too can only "open" the door (Yes, EVA) and it will NOT stay open! It closes immediately. Also, if I launch with it open, (It was opened in VAB) it will stay open and you cannot close it!

Running KSP .23

TB

I too can only "open" the door (Yes, EVA) and it will NOT stay open! It closes immediately. Also, if I launch with it open, (It was opened in VAB) it will stay open and you cannot close it!

Running KSP .23

TB

Ditto for me, doesn't stay open.

Looks awesome, will be downloading later. Should totally be in Stock KSP!

Edit: I put the parts into the Parts-folder, but it's not working?

The parts don't have their own folders, maybe that's the problem?

Edited December 24, 2013 by Lizard771
This doesn't use the old parts folder method, that method is outdated and no longer used!! You need to put his in Gamedata folder....

I love these things, use them on almost every manned space craft now. One of my favorite uses for them is for science equipment, especially placing mystery goo since it offsets the mass of my ship anywhere else.

It would be nice if there was some kind of end adapter piece for it though to keep odd textures from the parts its placed next to from showing on the inside (fuel tanks, etc), also whatever you place on the bottom or top of the container gets moved when you move around their respective parts instead of truly being attached to the container itself. Not a big deal or anything, just an idea.

Edited December 26, 2013 by RSF77

I'll second this. I use these all the time now, and what I've been using is the end piece adapter from Sumghai's FusTek expansion pack. It's basically just a very thin circular 2.5m hull piece that works great paired with these.

Very useful parts, Nothke! Thanks!
